The Causal Inference task view source is in the file `CausalInference.ctv` that
can be transformed into an HTML file using the **R** package [ctv](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ctv)


```{r ctvread, eval=TRUE}
library(ctv)
setwd(paste(getwd(), "source", sep = "/"))
source_ctv <- read.ctv("CausalInference.ctv")
```

```{r ctv2html, eval=TRUE}
ctv2html(source_ctv)
```

In addition, CTV can be checked before submission to CRAN with:
```{r ctvcheck, eval=FALSE}
check_ctv_packages("source/CausalInference.ctv")
```
